overlap.$description: Overlap amount between avatars in a group. Negative margin-left value. Set to 12px (37.5% of 32px avatar diameter) for tight, cohesive grouping.

overlapLead.$description: Overlap amount between lead avatar and the next group. Smaller than standard overlap to create visual separation, emphasizing the lead avatar's role. 6px (18.75% of 32px avatar diameter) provides clear distinction.

overlapTight.$description: Tighter overlap amount between avatars in a group when a lead avatar is present. Used for avatars after the lead to create a more cohesive subgroup. 16px (50% of 32px avatar diameter) creates tighter grouping.

maxVisible.$description: Maximum number of avatars to display before showing a count indicator. This is a reference value for component logic (not used in CSS). Component should use this as default max prop value. After this number, show first N avatars + count indicator.

spread.$description: Additional spacing when hovering over an avatar. Neighbors spread out by this amount for better visibility.

scale.$description: Scale factor for hovered avatar. Slightly enlarges the hovered avatar for emphasis.

duration.$description: Animation duration for hover spread effect.

easing.$description: Animation easing function for hover spread effect.
